column4: Is it a bug or a feature that when I copy or cut some text from a window and close that window - all the text copied is lost?
oh, I find that so annoying. Previously I used klipper in KDE and that made the CopyPaste-mess easier to deal with. I don't know if gnome has something like it.
im hoping glipper will atleast make the problem smaller
I didn't know about that one. Installing it now...
